_meanings:
{@--1@} A 
distinguishing feature or characteristic, an
attribute.

{@--3@} A mark
on the forehead with sandal, 
saffron &c.; <ls>M. 3. 5.</ls>

{@--4@} Drawing
lines of painting on the face and
person with coloured unguents and
cosmetics; {#svedodgamaH kiMpuruzAMganAnAM#}
{#cakra padaM patraviSezakezu#} <ls>Ku. 3. 33</ls>,  
<ls>R. 9. 29</ls>, <ls>Śi. 3. 63</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">10. 84.</ls>
